messages.content: A year ago I spent a lot of time doing research for an article. Then a top journal accepted it for publication.
It was about the medieval poet Geoffrey Chaucer.
I'm not familiar with him where is he from
He was an English poet in the fourteenth century,
and how did you learn about him
He was an English poet in the fourteenth century

evidence: and how did you learn about him
